GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object with a specified article ID

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects with a specified article ID

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an object of a new comment

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.body: Crumpets with butter are my favourite!

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of a specified article with a changed vote count

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes an object of a specified comment by comment ID

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of user objects

GET /api/articles?topic.description: serves an array of article objects
